Hero.h2: Hostly.io is your all-in-one AI-powered hosting platform for eCommerce and Smart Pages — fast, secure, and built to help your business grow effortlessly.

Feature.description1: High-performance AI hosting designed for online stores and smart landing pages.
Feature.description2: Powered by Next.js, Node, and scalable cloud infrastructure for speed and reliability.
Feature.description3: Fully optimized for SEO, mobile, and AI integrations — ready to scale with your brand.

Pricing.description: Flexible plans for creators, entrepreneurs, and growing businesses — pay only for what you need.
Pricing.follow: Follow us on Twitter for updates and new AI tools.

Testimonial.description1: See what entrepreneurs, developers, and digital creators are saying about Hostly.io.
Testimonial.description3: join the community and experience next-level hosting.

Faq.description: Find quick answers about renewing your domain, updating your plan, and maximizing your store’s performance.

CTA.h3: Get your eCommerce site or AI Smart Page live in minutes with Hostly.io.

About.h2: We build reliable, AI-driven hosting solutions that empower entrepreneurs to launch, manage, and scale their digital presence effortlessly.
About.why_content: With cutting-edge performance, built-in AI tools, and 24/7 support, we help businesses stay fast, secure, and ahead of the competition.
About.team_content: Our passionate team of developers, designers, and engineers is dedicated to creating hosting technology that empowers innovation and success for every user.

Blog.title: Hostly Blog
Blog.description: Insights, tutorials, and updates on hosting, AI tools, and digital growth strategies.
